name: Elridge Gammad
text: Education is impprtant but the voting system could be a game changer like switching to a preferential/ ranked voting system using the Borda count

source_obj.text: Education is impprtant but the voting system could be a game changer like switching to a preferential/ ranked voting system using the Borda count

replies.text: Interesting input, napa-google ako dun a. I wonder how a Borda count would have affected this election's outcome? Would the polarization between Mar and Duterte mean someone like Binay could win?
